0x80: Set sail with Linebeck for the first time (allows you to use the navigation pen)
0x40: Showed Linebeck the SW sea chart
0x20: Talked to Oshus after seeing Red Chu CS
0x8: Talked to the Bartender about Linebeck's whereabouts
0x2: Celia text after getting Oshus' Sword

0x80: Linebeck dialogue talking about the Sun Key (triggers when you set sail)
0x8: Set when the CS after obtaining the Phantom Hourglass has been watched.
0x4: Saw Linebeck's Ship for the first time CS
0x2: Mercay Island bridge repaired (set during the CS where you show Linebeck the SW sea chart)

0x80: Talked to Fuzo the first time

0x2: Door to back of Eddo's shop is open

0x40: Watched CS that spawns Phantoms in  ToTOK Floor 2
0x10: Watched Isle of Ember opening CS
0x8: Entered Astrid's Basement after talking to Kayo

0x80: Noticed Linebeck missing from ToTOK entrance
0x20: Linebeck warns Link that ToTOK will suck the life out of him
0x10: Linebeck trapped in first room of temple of ocean king

0x1: Talked to astrid after Temple of Flames

0x4: Green crest icon displayed on SW sea chart
Talked to Postman for the first time

0x8: Talked with Linebeck at the ship after Temple of Flames

0x40: Set when mercay earthquake cs is done, but doesn't seem to have an effect when its set before that
0x4: Saw trapped Linebeck in ToTOK CS
0x2: Talked to Oshus for the first time

0x8: Talked with postman after recieving first letter

0x4: Met up with Linebeck after freeing him (cs where you get the key)

0x8: Set every time you leave ToTOK

0x40: Removed Rocks from Lapelli's yard (may spawn the item from the tree in north mercay that he references. idk)

0x80: Watched Red Chu CS on Mercay
0x40: Watched Bridge Broken CS on Mercay
0x4: Rocks fell in Mercay guys yard (gives you rupee for picking up all rocks)

0x40: Went outside with Fuzo (opens the gate to eddo's island)
0x8: Watched CS after obtaining the Phantom Hourglass before ToTOK 2
0x4: Oshus CS during ToTOK 2 (allows you to grab the hourglass)
0x2: Encountered Sea Trap for the first time (the green things you jump over)

0x1: Talked to Fuzo after getting Cannon from Eddo

0x4: Linebeck dialogue the first time you use the salvage arm

0x20: Blew the dust off the NW sea chart (Nayru seal on the Isle of Winds)
0x1: Called out to Astrid on Isle of Ember

0x20: Gate to Mercay sword chest open (removes celia text prompt)
0x2: Signed for the first postman's letter

0x80: Orange crest icon displayed on top of Ember Island on SW sea chart
0x8: CS after discovering rocks blocking path to West half of SW sea

0x2: Something to do with first cutscene on the beach?
0x1: Saw broken bridge for the first time

0x80: Door of Power opened in ToTOK

0x10: Linebeck explained how to cross Sea Chart boundaries

Note: Some sort of cutscene flag. Setting the whole byte to 0 has different effects depending on what state the game is in. On the title screen it disables animations for the waves, and in the intro CG it replaces the first "slide" (the one with Tetra + pirates sailing) with a shot of Bellum.

0x40: Health capacity (i.e. number of heart containers * 4)

Note: This address seems to be the base "player flags" address in the vanilla ROM.

0x80: Phantom Hourglass max timer (Max is 99:59, which is 359999 (0x57E3F))
Left Potion Slot Type (1= Red, 2 = Purple, 3 = Yellow
Right Potion Slot Type (1= Red, 2 = Purple, 3 = Yellow
Adds "Lv1" to Spirit of Courage (Yellow or White) if acquired

0x20: Spirit of Courage (White, only if Spirit of Courage (Yellow) not acquired)
0x4: Spirit of Courage Lv2  (Yellow or White)
0x2: Adds "Lv1" to Spirit of Wisdom if acquired
0x1: Adds "Lv1" to Spirit of Power if acquired

0x80: Removes the X Southwest Treasure Map 7

0x80: Bomb Count (If above max, will go to max when throwing a bomb)
Arrow Count (If above max, will go to max when shooting an arrow)
Bombchus Count (If above max, will go to max when launching a Bombchu)
